001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.contracts;
002
003import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance;
004import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
005import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.ClaimReference;
006import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.StorageErrorHandler;
007import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.regions.PingOneRegion;
008
009import java.util.Set;
010
011public interface StorageManagerContract {
012
013    /**
014     * Pass a StorageErrorHandler to handle any errors when trying to store data
015     * @param storageErrorHandler: implementation of StorageErrorHandler
016     * @see StorageErrorHandler
017     */
018    void setStorageErrorHandler(StorageErrorHandler storageErrorHandler);
019
020    /**
021     * Get storage error handler
022     * @return StorageErrorHandler, null if not set
023     */
024    StorageErrorHandler getStorageErrorHandler();
025
026    /**
027     * Save ApplicationInstance to storage for the region where it is registered
028     * @param walletRegion PingOneRegion where ApplicationInstance is registered
029     * @param applicationInstance: ApplicationInstance
030     */
031    void saveApplicationInstance(PingOneRegion walletRegion, ApplicationInstance applicationInstance);
032
033    ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance();
034
035    /**
036     * Get saved ApplicationInstance for a region
037     * @param walletRegion: PingOneRegion where ApplicationInstance is registered
038     * @return Saved ApplicationInstance if found, null otherwise
039     */
040    ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance(PingOneRegion walletRegion);
041
042    /**
043     * Save Claim
044     * @param claim: Claim to save
045     */
046    void saveClaim(Claim claim);
047
048    /**
049     * Get Claim for ID
050     * @param claimId: String of claimId
051     * @return Saved Claim if found, null otherwise
052     */
053    Claim getClaim(String claimId);
054
055    /**
056     * Save ClaimReference for revoked claims
057     * @param claimReference: ClaimReference
058     */
059    void saveClaimReference(ClaimReference claimReference);
060
061    /**
062     * Get ClaimReference for ID
063     * @param claimReferenceId: String claimReferenceID
064     * @return Saved ClaimReference if found, null otherwise
065     */
066    ClaimReference getClaimReference(String claimReferenceId);
067
068    /**
069     * Delete saved Claim
070     * @param claimId: String claimId
071     */
072    void deleteClaim(String claimId);
073
074    /**
075     * Generic method to save a string key-value pair in storage
076     * @param str: String value
077     * @param key: String key
078     */
079    void saveString(String str, String key);
080
081    /**
082     * Generic method to retrieve a stored string value for a key
083     * @param key: String key
084     * @return String value if found, null otherwise
085     */
086    String getString(String key);
087
088    /**
089     * Generic method to save a String collection in storage
090     * @param set: Set of Strings
091     * @param key: String key
092     */
093    void saveStringSet(Set<String> set, String key);
094
095    /**
096     * Generic method to retrieve a stored String collection
097     * @param key: String key
098     * @return Set of Strings if found, null otherwise
099     */
100    Set<String> getStringSet(String key);
101
102}
